name: Neighbourhood Nash
description:
Neighbourhood Nash is a skills based, 2D, top down driving game with a unique premise and aesthetic. The game has a direct connection to the real life daily chore of getting the shopping, while providing comedic relief through the actions of some devious birds, neighbours and other motorists. 

You as the player must simply quickly pop to the shops and home again without causing too many disturbances or accidents. Because if you do, you will lose!
